div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1123 Cepi (mod. Sennaia), 1961 Burial: c. mid 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 5 AE. In burial Panticapaeum: 3 AE (as BMC 44-46 [2]; Zograph, pl. 41, 9 [1]) Phanagoria: 2 AE (as BMC 2-3) Disposition: Moscow Frolova-Shelov, NSf 1965, p. 192, nos. 349-53
